author: Peter Chua Zhibin
description: “Sugar Man strives to be a drink that quenches the thirst, excites the palate and heals the soul of it's imbiber. “Sugar Man, by Sixto Rodriguez, is a song about a man searching for his sugar man to ease his worries -  and Rodriguez became just that by giving his listeners hope during troubled times with his song.“Long before this song, a man by the name of Don Facundo Bacardí Masso had an interest in the art of distilling. He created one of the finest rums in the world, a rum that the Cubans regarded as a salvation from the harsh and fiery ‘ron’ previously available – a rum we know as BACARDÍ.“By offering a moment of tranquillity to the people of Cuba with each sip of his rum during difficult times, Don Facundo Bacardí Masso became the embodiment of the Sugar Man.“A man. A song. A drink. A legacy. Taste the Sugar Man.”
name: Sugar Man
